The AR Bonus to a piece of armour varies greatly depending on what the item is (e.g. since a gorget only adds a small amount to AR, each defensive bonus only increases the base by a small amount).

==Armor Metal Colors==
* Iron
* Dull Copper
* Shadow
* Copper
* Bronze
* Gold
* Apapite
* Verite
* Valorite

Metal types/colors for playermade armor affects the durability and armor rating (AR) of the armor. Runic hammers do not have any impact on the armor.
